## Discussion

When you finish with a decompression session you created, call this function to tear it down, and then [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/corefoundation/1521153-cfrelease] to release your object reference.

# VTDecompressionSessionInvalidate(_:)

**Function**

Tears down a decompression session.

## Declaration

```swift
func VTDecompressionSessionInvalidate(_ session: VTDecompressionSession)
```

## Parameters

- **session**: The decompression session to invalidate.

## Discussion

When you finish with a decompression session you created, call this function to tear it down, and then [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/corefoundation/1521153-cfrelease] to release your object reference.
title: VTDecompressionSessionInvalidate(_:)
